      • getNthParent

        public static ScriptContext getNthParent(ScriptContext c,
                                         int n)
        Attempts to get the n-th order parent. If n is 0, then this method just returns the ScriptContext object provided.
        Parameters:
        c - The child ScriptContext object.
        n - The n-th order parent to search for (for example, 2 will search for the parent of the parent).
        Returns:
        The n-th order parent.
